name: Instagram
title: instagram.com
shortDescription: Instagram is a social media platform that allows users to share photos and videos, connect with friends, and explore content from around the world. It's designed for individuals who enjoy visual storytelling and businesses looking to engage with a visually-oriented audience. A common use case is a brand using Instagram to run targeted ad campaigns to increase their visibility and engage with potential customers.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Snapchat
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on ephemeral, real-time content sharing

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: TikTok
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Short-form video content with high engagement
